== Who I am ==

My name is Guoqing Jiang, and I have been a member of the Ubuntu Kernel Team
since Feb 2024. I got a master degree on "computer science" from National University of Defense Technology. 

== My Ubuntu story ==

My first experience with Ubuntu is in 2006, in that year, I got 6.04 CD which was shipped from overseas. After that, I am more and more used to Linux instead of Windows.

=== My involvement ===

Right now, I am mainly working on Mediatek kernel. Beside that, I also spent some time on review maillist patches, cranky derivative kernels and others.

https://bugs.launchpad.net/~guoqingjiang

I'm requesting upload rights for the kernel package set for all active series, which includes all the "linux*" packages.

=== Hui Wang ===
==== General feedback ====

I sponsored a couple of kernels for Guoqing (at least 4), and I didn't remember any issues from his cranking, his cranking work is perfect from my point of view. And he knows the SRU process very well already and he is an experienced user of cranky commands. I totally trust him in terms of cranking kernels and the whole kernel SRU process boundaries.
